short_description: advanced wireless solutions is a construction services company based in gray, tennessee, united states.
long_description: advanced wireless solutions, inc. is a general contractor providing turnkey construction services for the telecommunications and broadcast industries. we specialize in the construction of cellular and pcs communications sites as well as broadcast and microwave systems. this culture empowers our crews to make the right safety decisions every time. whether you are e911 providing municipality or need to make response to cellular carriers, aws is here to help you make those grants into realities. this non-profit assessment and certification organization is being created to serve as the governance entity of the wireless industry safety task force's national wireless skilled-based training.
generated_description: advanced wireless solutions, legally known as advanced wireless solutions inc., is a general contractor based in johnson city, tennessee. the company specializes in providing turnkey construction services for the telecommunications and broadcast industries. their expertise includes the construction of cellular and pcs communications sites, broadcast and microwave systems, and advanced metering infrastructure. advanced wireless solutions also offers services in site preparation and construction, emergency management, and the installation of discreet structures. the company prioritizes safety in all its operations.
